scripts.build-publish: npm run build && rm -rf dist/tests && rm -rf dist/lib/*.js.map
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json lib/**/*.ts && tslint -c tests/tslint.json tests/**/*.ts
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover --dir ./dist/coverage ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- dist/tests/**/*.js --report lcovonly -R spec --bail -- && cat ./dist/coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
